summary: Showdown in Abilene between lawmen Pat Garrett, Wyatt Earp, Bat Masterson and Butch Cassidy's gang over a large shipment of money arriving by train.
cast: George Montgomery|Neville Brand|Buster Crabbe|Karin Booth|Gregory Walcott|Malcolm Atterbury|Russell Johnson|Richard Devon|Morris Ankrum|Dan Riss|The Mellowmen Quartet|John Barton|Martin Benedict|William Bryant|Jack Carol|George DeNormand|Steve Drexel|Sam Finn|George Ford|Fred Graham|Kit Guard|John Harmon|Michael Jeffers|Leroy Johnson|Jack Kenney|Fred Krone|Richard LaMarr|Lewis Martin|Russell Meeker|Troy Melton|Bob Reeves|Buddy Roosevelt|Tim Sullivan|Bob Terhune|Jack Tornek|Chalky Williams|Al Wyatt Sr.

title: Badman's Country
